categories.name: Entertainment
categories.description: Movies, pools, escape rooms, and unique experiences

localInsight.title: Local Secret
localInsight.message: Visit swimming pools and thermal baths on weekday mornings - you can get discounted rates and it's much less crowded than weekends.

localInsight.title: Local Secret
localInsight.message: Book cinema tickets online or call ahead - reserve especially popular movies in advance.

categories.name: Activities
categories.description: Rock climbing, rafting, cycling, and outdoor experiences

localInsight.title: Local Secret
localInsight.message: You can book hiking guides through local guesthouses, not tour companies - you'll get authentic routes, better prices, and guides who know hidden spots.

localInsight.title: Local Secret
localInsight.message: Best hiking weather is April-June and September-October. Locals avoid July-August heat and winter snow. Spring brings wildflowers that locals love to photograph.

categories.name: Shopping
categories.description: Malls, markets, and unique shopping experiences

localInsight.title: Local Secret
localInsight.message: Shop at local markets in the morning for the best selection and prices. Vendors often give better deals to early customers before tourist hours.

localInsight.title: Local Secret
localInsight.message: Bargaining is expected at traditional markets but not common in modern malls. Start at 70% of asking price - negotiate respectfully, never aggressively.

defaultMessage.title: Select a category to get started
defaultMessage.description: Choose from entertainment, activities, and shopping to discover amazing experiences in Albania

entertainment.name: Cineplexx Albania
entertainment.description: The largest cinema complex in Albania with seven screening rooms
entertainment.location: TEG Shopping Mall and QTU Mall
entertainment.shortDescription: Albania's premier cinema chain with state-of-the-art facilities
entertainment.detailedDescription: Cineplexx is Austria-based cinema company that operates the largest cinema complex in Albania. With seven screening rooms, it shows mostly blockbuster films in their original languages with Albanian subtitles. Located in both TEG and QTU shopping malls, it offers modern cinema experience with comfortable seating and advanced sound systems.
keyFeatures: Original language films with Albanian subtitles
Concession stand with snacks and drinks
entertainment.bookingRequired: Recommended for evening and weekend shows
entertainment.additionalInfo: Founded in 1993, offers the best sound and image quality in Albania

entertainment.name: Kinema Millennium
entertainment.description: Historic cinema near Skanderbeg Square offering affordable movie experience
entertainment.shortDescription: Affordable cinema experience in the heart of Tirana
entertainment.detailedDescription: Kinema Millennium is located near Skanderbeg Square and offers a comfortable, affordable cinema experience. Known for showing recent American films in their original language with Albanian subtitles, it provides a cool, comfortable environment perfect for escaping the heat of Tirana.
entertainment.bookingRequired: Advance booking recommended for popular films
entertainment.additionalInfo: Staff speaks English, making it convenient for international visitors

entertainment.name: Aquadrom Swimming Complex
entertainment.description: Albania's largest aquatic center with Olympic-sized pool and multiple facilities
entertainment.shortDescription: Largest aquatic center in Tirana with Olympic facilities
entertainment.detailedDescription: Aquadrom is the largest swimming complex in Albania's capital, strategically located near the Artificial Lake of Tirana. It features one of the country's few Olympic-sized pools (50m long, 8 lanes) and is divided into five categories: Olympic swimming pool, VIP swimming pool, family swimming pool, and trampoline swimming pool.
entertainment.additionalInfo: Some facilities may be closed or require additional fees for access

entertainment.name: Select Hill Resort Pool
entertainment.description: Modern resort with indoor and outdoor swimming pools offering mountain views
entertainment.address: Rruga Nacionale Tirane-Dajt km5, Dajt, Tirana
entertainment.shortDescription: Premium resort pools with stunning mountain views
entertainment.detailedDescription: Select Hill Resort features both indoor heated and outdoor swimming pools with spectacular mountain views. The indoor pool maintains urban aesthetic with glass walls, while outdoor pool hosts weekend pool parties with Albanian singers and foam parties.
keyFeatures: Large outdoor pool with mountain views
entertainment.ageRange: All ages (children under 14 must be supervised)
entertainment.additionalInfo: Weekend events feature famous Albanian singers and themed parties

entertainment.name: Tirana Escape Room
entertainment.description: The first and only escape room experience in Tirana with multiple themed rooms
entertainment.shortDescription: Albania's premier escape room experience with challenging puzzles
entertainment.detailedDescription: Tirana Escape Room offers the only authentic escape room experience in Albania. With multiple themed rooms including spy missions and art gallery heists, players have 60 minutes to solve puzzles and escape. The facility features hand-made wooden puzzles and strong Albanian character themes.
entertainment.additionalInfo: No physical effort required, only wit and observation skills

entertainment.name: VR Games Lounge
entertainment.description: Albania's first and only Virtual Reality gaming center with HTC Vive headsets
entertainment.shortDescription: First VR gaming center in Albania with comprehensive game library
entertainment.detailedDescription: VR Games Lounge is the first Virtual Reality gaming center in Albania, featuring dedicated VR rooms equipped with HTC Vive headsets. The facility offers a comprehensive game library suitable for all ages above 12, with options for both single-player and multiplayer experiences.
keyFeatures: Wide variety of games (dancing to action)
entertainment.additionalInfo: First VR center opened in Tirana and Albania

entertainment.name: Cooking Class Tirana
entertainment.description: Hands-on Albanian cooking experience led by founder Dervis
entertainment.shortDescription: Authentic Albanian cooking classes with traditional dishes
entertainment.detailedDescription: Founded by Dervis, Cooking Class Tirana offers hands-on cooking experiences focusing on traditional Albanian cuisine. Participants learn to make dishes like byrek and tavë kosi while gaining insights into Albanian culture and culinary traditions.
keyFeatures: Small class sizes for personal attention
entertainment.additionalInfo: Uses only the best local produce and traditional techniques

entertainment.name: Go As Local Cooking Class
entertainment.description: Traditional Albanian cooking experience with host Sindi featuring authentic dishes
entertainment.shortDescription: Immersive cooking class with traditional Albanian hospitality
entertainment.detailedDescription: Led by experienced host Sindi with nearly a decade of culinary expertise, this cooking class combines traditional Albanian cooking with cultural immersion. Participants learn to prepare Lakror, Tave Kosi, and traditional desserts while enjoying homemade wine and raki.
entertainment.additionalInfo: Host has nearly a decade of culinary experience and focuses on authentic techniques

entertainment.name: Ring Center Entertainment
entertainment.description: Shopping center with unique entertainment including skating rink and special cinemas
entertainment.shortDescription: Multi-level entertainment complex with unique attractions
entertainment.detailedDescription: Ring Center offers more than shopping with its impressive entertainment options on upper floors. The complex features an ice skating rink, 5D and 7D cinema experiences, and various games that make it a hit with families and kids seeking unique entertainment experiences.
entertainment.additionalInfo: Entertainment options are located on upper floors of the shopping center

entertainment.name: Arka Rooftop Pool
entertainment.description: Mosaic pool with panoramic city views in Residence Kodra e Diellit
entertainment.shortDescription: Rooftop pool with the best panoramic views of Tirana
entertainment.detailedDescription: Arka Rooftop Pool offers the best views in Tirana from the Residence Kodra e Diellit. The mosaic pool features natural stone with bird and animal motifs reminiscent of Noah's Ark, providing a unique and artistic swimming experience above the city.
entertainment.additionalInfo: Pool design inspired by Noah's Ark with artistic animal motifs

experiences.name: Rock Climbing in Albanian Alps
experiences.description: Multi-pitch climbing and sport climbing on limestone cliffs in the Accursed Mountains
experiences.shortDescription: World-class climbing on pristine limestone in the Accursed Mountains
experiences.detailedDescription: The Albanian Alps offer over 80 rock climbing routes across six sectors with vast potential for new adventures. The limestone cliffs provide smooth vertical walls demanding precision, while overhanging caves test strength and agility. Areas like Theth and Valbona Valley offer climbing opportunities catering to different skill levels, from beginners to experienced climbers seeking adrenaline-filled ascents.
experiences.requirements: Basic climbing experience recommended for advanced routes
experiences.equipment: Climbing gear provided, bring personal harness if preferred

experiences.name: Bovilla Reservoir Climbing
experiences.description: Sport climbing at Albania's largest crag with stunning lake views near Tirana
experiences.shortDescription: Albania's largest climbing crag with lake views and diverse routes
experiences.detailedDescription: Located just 25 kilometers from Tirana, Bovilla Reservoir is Albania's largest climbing destination. The limestone crag is split into six sectors scattered around the reservoir, allowing climbers to chase sun or shade all day. The climbing style offers something for everyone from delicate slabs to funky tufas, with grades ranging from F5a to F8b+.
keyFeatures: Routes from beginner to expert level
experiences.requirements: No prior experience needed for beginner routes

experiences.name: Vjosa River Rafting
experiences.description: Class II-III rafting on Europe's last free-flowing river through pristine wilderness
experiences.shortDescription: Adventure rafting on Europe's last wild river with pristine nature
experiences.detailedDescription: The Vjosa River, known as Europe's last free-flowing river, offers class II rafting with some class III rapids. Prepare for waves up to four feet and narrow passages. The entire 270km course is wild and untamed, adorned with beautiful canyons, braided river sections, islands and oxbows. The experience includes exploration of nature and opportunities to jump from cliffs and swim in crystal-clear waters.
keyFeatures: Class II-III rapids suitable for beginners
experiences.includedServices: Professional guide, safety equipment, wetsuit, transfers
experiences.equipment: All rafting equipment, life jackets, helmets provided

experiences.name: Osumi Canyon Rafting
experiences.description: Spectacular rafting through Albania's largest canyon with waterfalls and unique geology
experiences.shortDescription: Navigate Albania's spectacular canyon with towering walls and waterfalls
experiences.detailedDescription: Osumi Canyon is Albania's largest canyon, 13km long with width varying from 4-35 meters and over 80 meters high. The rafting tour provides opportunities to see more than 4 waterfalls and interesting rock formations. From April to mid-June, the canyon welcomes rafting enthusiasts from across Europe. The experience combines adventure with natural beauty in this unique geological formation.
keyFeatures: Albania's largest and most spectacular canyon
experiences.requirements: Basic swimming ability, suitable for families
experiences.includedServices: Guide, rafting equipment, transport, lunch option
experiences.equipment: Complete rafting gear, safety equipment provided

experiences.name: Cycling Tour of Albania
experiences.description: Multi-day cycling adventure from Lake Ohrid to the Mediterranean coast
experiences.shortDescription: Epic cycling journey across Albania's diverse landscapes and UNESCO sites
experiences.detailedDescription: This cycling tour stretches from Lake Ohrid's shoreline to the Mediterranean coast, with E-bike support throughout Albania's diverse terrain. Cyclists climb the majestic Llogara Pass, wind through Vjosa River valleys, and glide through Përmet's mountain scenery. The journey includes three UNESCO sites: Butrint's ancient ruins, Gjirokastra's Ottoman buildings, and Berat's historic district.
keyFeatures: E-bike options with Giant Explore E+1 GTS
experiences.requirements: Moderate fitness level, cycling experience helpful
experiences.includedServices: Guide, bike rental, accommodation, meals, support vehicle
experiences.equipment: Quality bikes provided, bring personal gear

experiences.name: Dajti Mountain Cycling
experiences.description: Mountain biking adventure on Tirana's backyard mountain with cable car access
experiences.location: Dajti Mountain National Park, 26km from Tirana
experiences.shortDescription: Mountain biking on Tirana's natural balcony with spectacular views
experiences.detailedDescription: Dajti Mountain offers excellent mountain biking opportunities in Albania's first national park. Access via the famous Dajti Ekspres cable car or drive up for various trail options. The mountain provides trails for all skill levels with panoramic views of Tirana and the Adriatic Sea from the 'Natural Balcony of Tirana.'
experiences.includedServices: Mountain bike rental, basic maintenance, trail maps
experiences.equipment: Mountain bikes, helmets, protective gear provided

experiences.name: DUKA Winery Experience
experiences.description: Premium winery experience with kayaking and lakeside dining
experiences.shortDescription: Unique winery experience combining wine tasting with outdoor activities
experiences.detailedDescription: DUKA Winery offers one of Albania's best wine tour experiences, featuring guided tours of 6-hectare vineyards where grapes are grown using environmentally friendly methods. The experience includes wine tastings of special blends like Rose Tempranilo and Reserva Superior, traditional Albanian raki, and unique activities like kayaking and lakeside dining.
experiences.requirements: None, suitable for all ages (non-alcoholic options available)
experiences.includedServices: Vineyard tour, wine tasting, kayak rental, restaurant dining

experiences.name: Theth to Valbona Hike
experiences.description: Epic day hike through Albanian Alps connecting two pristine mountain villages
experiences.shortDescription: Albania's most famous trek through the heart of the Accursed Mountains
experiences.detailedDescription: This legendary 17km trek connects Theth and Valbona villages through the heart of the Albanian Alps. The route crosses Valbona Pass at 1,795m elevation, offering spectacular views of the Accursed Mountains. Since there's no road connecting the two villages, hiking is the only way to travel between them, making this a unique wilderness experience.
experiences.requirements: Good fitness level, mountain hiking experience helpful
experiences.includedServices: Guesthouse accommodation, meals, local transport arrangements
experiences.equipment: Proper hiking boots, layers, rain gear essential

experiences.name: Albanian Alps Multi-Day Trekking
experiences.description: Extended trekking adventure exploring multiple peaks and valleys in the Accursed Mountains
experiences.shortDescription: Extended wilderness trekking through Albania's most remote mountains
experiences.detailedDescription: Multi-day trekking adventures in the Albanian Alps offer access to remote valleys and challenging peaks. Routes include the Peaks of the Balkans trail section, ascents of peaks like Jezerca (2,694m), and exploration of pristine valleys. Experience includes camping or mountain hut accommodation and traditional mountain culture.
experiences.requirements: Excellent fitness, previous trekking experience essential
experiences.includedServices: Professional guide, camping equipment, meals, permits
experiences.equipment: Personal hiking gear, camping equipment provided

experiences.name: Blue Eye and Waterfalls Hiking
experiences.description: Day hikes to Albania's most spectacular natural springs and waterfalls
experiences.location: Theth and Syri i Kalter (Blue Eye)
experiences.shortDescription: Discover Albania's most beautiful natural springs and waterfalls
experiences.detailedDescription: Albania features numerous spectacular natural springs and waterfalls perfect for day hiking. The famous Blue Eye (Syri i Kalter) near Sarandë offers crystal-clear spring waters, while Theth's Blue Eye and Grunas Waterfall provide mountain spring experiences. These hikes are perfect for families and nature photographers.

experiences.name: Komani Lake Ferry and Hiking
experiences.description: Scenic ferry journey through Albanian fjords combined with hiking opportunities
experiences.duration: Full day with ferry and hiking
experiences.shortDescription: Experience Albania's most scenic ferry ride through mountain fjords
experiences.detailedDescription: The Komani Lake ferry journey is often called the highlight of visiting Northern Albania. The 2-3 hour ferry ride through narrow gorges and turquoise waters provides access to remote hiking areas and connects to the Albanian Alps. Combined with short hikes, it offers spectacular mountain and lake scenery.
experiences.requirements: No special requirements, suitable for all ages
experiences.includedServices: Ferry ticket, transfers to/from Shkodër, basic guide
experiences.equipment: Camera, comfortable clothing, light hiking shoes

experiences.name: Abaia Winery & Vineyard
experiences.description: Unique winery experience in converted communist-era bunkers with artisanal winemaking
experiences.shortDescription: Historic bunker winery offering authentic Albanian wine experience
experiences.detailedDescription: Abaia Winery began operations in 2019 with 1 hectare of vineyard and produced its first wines in 2021. The unique wine cellar is built within two bunkers constructed during the communist era, creating an intimate setting where visitors witness the entire winemaking process from harvesting to aging in oak barrels.
keyFeatures: Wine tasting with local cheese pairings
experiences.requirements: None, suitable for all ages (non-alcoholic options available)
experiences.includedServices: Vineyard tour, wine tasting, local cheese and snacks
experiences.equipment: Comfortable walking shoes, camera for scenic views

experiences.name: Çobo Winery
experiences.description: Century-old family winery at the foot of Mount Tomorr near UNESCO town of Berat
experiences.location: Berat, at foot of Mount Tomorr
experiences.shortDescription: Historic family winery with century-old winemaking tradition near Berat
experiences.detailedDescription: The Çobo family has been preserving the best of the land and vineyards for about a century. Located in the rolling hills surrounding Berat at the foot of Mt. Tomorr, the winery features several cultivated vineyards, a spacious traditional Albanian kulla architecture, and a dedicated wine presentation room.
keyFeatures: Personal interaction with Çobo family members
Red, white, and sparkling wine production
experiences.requirements: None, suitable for all ages (non-alcoholic options available)
experiences.includedServices: Vineyard tour, wine cellar visit, wine tasting, appetizers
experiences.equipment: Comfortable walking shoes, camera for vineyard views

shopping.name: Tirana East Gate (TEG)
shopping.description: Albania's largest shopping mall with over 150 stores, entertainment, and dining
shopping.shortDescription: Largest shopping destination in Albania with international brands
shopping.detailedDescription: Tirana East Gate (TEG) is Albania's largest shopping mall, offering a vast array of shops, entertainment options, and dining experiences. Located just a short drive from the city center, TEG boasts over 150 stores, including renowned international brands and local boutiques. The mall also features a multiplex cinema, a large food court, and a children's play area, ensuring entertainment for visitors of all ages.
keyFeatures: Extensive food court with various cuisines

shopping.name: Toptani Shopping Center
shopping.description: Modern 7-floor shopping center in the heart of Tirana with stylish design
shopping.shortDescription: Stylish shopping center in the heart of Tirana
shopping.detailedDescription: Toptani Shopping Center is known for its stylish and contemporary design, hosting a variety of shops, including fashion, electronics, and lifestyle stores. Located near Tirana's center, it offers excellent accessibility and features underground parking. The mall also offers several dining options and one of the largest kids' play areas in the city.

shopping.name: QTU Shopping Center
shopping.description: One of Tirana's oldest and most established shopping destinations
shopping.shortDescription: Established shopping destination with comprehensive amenities
shopping.detailedDescription: QTU is one of the oldest and most well-known shopping malls in Tirana. It has been a favorite shopping destination for years, offering everything from clothing and accessories to electronics and groceries. The mall features a large supermarket and several dining options, making it a one-stop destination for all shopping needs.

shopping.name: European Trade Center (ETC)
shopping.description: Modern shopping mall in central Tirana with international and local brands
shopping.shortDescription: Modern shopping destination with diverse brand selection
shopping.detailedDescription: The European Trade Center (ETC) is a modern shopping mall located in the heart of Tirana. It houses numerous international and local brands, providing a wide range of shopping options for visitors. ETC also features several cafes and restaurants, where shoppers can relax and enjoy a meal or coffee break.
keyFeatures: Mix of international and local brands
